description: Gets a list of recommended intents provided by the bot recommendation that you can use in your bot. Intents in the response are ordered by relevance.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the recommended intents.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot that contains the recommended intents.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the recommended intents.

parameters.name: botRecommendationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot recommendation that contains the recommended intents.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot associated with the recommended intent.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the intent.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale of the intents to list. The string must match one of the supported locales. For more information, see Supported languages.

nested_items.name: botRecommendationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot recommendation that contains the recommended intent.

nested_items.name: summaryList
nested_items.description: Summary information for the intents that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter of the request. If there are more intents available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: intentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a recommended intent associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: intentName
nested_items.description: The name of a recommended intent associated with the bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: sampleUtterancesCount
nested_items.description: The count of sample utterances of a recommended intent that is associated with a bot recommendation.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListRecommendedIntents operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListRecommendedIntents operation request to get the next page of results.
